page_content: The page discusses the initiation of the Volkszählung 2000, a population census in the Canton of Graubünden, Switzerland.
The page mentions the development of "SofTax," a software for tax declaration in the Canton of Graubünden, Switzerland.
The page announces the launch of an interactive statistics portal, the "Statistischer Atlas Graubünden," which uses Géoclip software for data visualization.
The page provides a comprehensive list of services, guides, and tutorials related to software and IT for schools in the Canton of Basel-Landschaft, Switzerland.
The page offers a list of databases containing learning software and apps for primary schools in the Canton of Basel-Landschaft, Switzerland.
